metadata.title: Interior minister calls on PM Shehbaz Sharif

content.article_body:
LAHORE, Oct 19 (APP):Interior Minister Mohsin Raza Naqvi called on Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif, here on Sunday.

During the meeting, the minister briefed the premier on country's law and order situation.

The prime minister was also briefed about ongoing development projects in Islamabad.
